env.npm_package_scripts_lint_ci: mkdir -p test-results && npm run guard:external-links && eslint . --max-warnings=0 --format json --output-file test-results/eslint-results.json
env.npm_package_scripts_test_ci: npm run check:image-architecture && jest --ci --runInBand --reporters=default --testLocationInResults --json --outputFile=jest-results.json | tee jest-full.log
env.npm_package_description: Cross-platform travel application built with React Native and Expo.
env.npm_package_scripts_perf_bundle: npm run build:web:prod && npm run analyze:bundle
env.npm_package_scripts_build_web_prod: cp .env.prod .env && NODE_ENV=production EXPO_ENV=prod EXPO_WEB_BUILD_MINIFY=true EXPO_WEB_BUILD_GENERATE_SOURCE_MAP=false node ./node_modules/expo/bin/cli export --output-dir dist/prod -p web -c && node scripts/generate-seo-pages.js --dist dist/prod && node scripts/stamp-sw-version.js dist/prod
env.npm_package_scripts_governance_verify: npm run guard:external-links && npm run test:governance
env.npm_package_scripts_perf_lighthouse: npm run lighthouse:travel:mobile && npm run lighthouse:travel:desktop
env.npm_package_browserslist_production_0: defaults and not ie <= 11 and not op_mini all
env.npm_package_scripts_guard_external_links: npm run guard:no-direct-linking-openurl && npm run guard:no-direct-window-open
env.npm_package_scripts_release_check: yarn run lint && ./verify-security-fixes.sh && yarn run audit:high && yarn run test:run && yarn run e2e && yarn run build:web
